tool_description: This is a small API which shows live feeds (updated every few hours)
name: Crypto Currency News
title: Crypto Currency News

api_list.name: Get News on Crypto Currencies from Individual Sources
api_list.description: It gives the News from sources Individually.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-currency-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/businessinsider"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-currency-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-currency-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newsid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-currency-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get The Latest Crypto Currency News
api_list.description: It returns all the News about the Crypto Worldwide
